function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission through respiratory droplets and airborne routes","Impact":"Spread of infection and increased risk of contagion","Mitigation":"Implementation of face masks, social distancing, and proper ventilation","Technologies":"Face masks, air purifiers, ventilation systems","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Survival of virus on surfaces","Impact":"Risk of contact transmission by touching contaminated surfaces","Mitigation":"Frequent hand washing, surface disinfection, use of gloves","Technologies":"Hand sanitizers, surface disinfectants, gloves","People":"General public, cleaning staff","Owner":"Individuals, cleaning companies"},{"Description":"Misunderstanding of environmental stability","Impact":"Misinformation and false assumptions leading to increased risk of infection","Mitigation":"Educational campaigns, accurate information dissemination, public health announcements","Technologies":"Information platforms, public health messaging systems","People":"General public, policymakers, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"}]}
